screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .pyx file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
screenshot.caption: PYX file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code

description: Since Pyrex is used for writing modules for Python software, PYX files may sometimes be found with Python applications.
NOTE: Cython is an extension of Pyrex that contains several enhancements. Developers often prefer Cython to Pyrex.
